summary: THE SUSPENSION IS HORRIBLE - EVERY LITTLE BUMP IN THE ROAD THE CAR MAKES A LOAD NOISE - LIKE THE SUSPENSION IS GONE.  THIS IS A 2013 AND THIS SHOULD BE HAPPENING.  I HAVE A 2008 CTS AND NEVER HAD A SUSPENSION ISSUE AND THAT CAR HAVE OVER 160,000 MILES.  THIS SEEMS LIKE A DEFECT BECAUSE I WAS READING ALL THE COMPLAINTS.  I BROUGHT THE CAR IN MAY 2016 AND IT IS GETTING WORSE.  I CAN'T BE A SPECIFIC DATE BUT THE PROBLEM IS ONGOING.  I DON'T THINK THE CONSUMER HAVE TO PAY OUT OF POCKET TO GET THIS FIX.
